A4.text: Corn for grain, average of 160.4 bushels harvested per acre (10.07 t/ha)

A5.text: By 1973 soybeans were the United States' 'number one cash crop, and leading export commodity, ahead of both wheat and corn'

A6.text: Soybeans are the most valuable agricultural export of the United States.

A7.text: In 2021, 87,195,000 acres were planted, with the largest acreage in the states of Illinois, Iowa, and Minnesota.
